pages.catalog: DoorElegance: Your Premier Door Store in India | Catalog Home Catalog Why Choose us Features Work Process Our Product Catalog Classic Wooden Door ₹15,000 Order Modern Glass Door ₹26,000 Order Secure Steel Door ₹30,000 Order Elegant French Door ₹35,000 Order Rustic Barn Door ₹20,000 Order Contemporary Sliding Door ₹28,000 Order About Us DoorElegance was founded with a vision to provide high-quality, aesthetically pleasing doors that elevate the beauty and functionality of homes across India. Our journey began over a decade ago, with a small team of dedicated craftsmen and a passion for creating the perfect door for every home. Today, we are proud to be one of the leading door manufacturers in the country, offering a wide range of products from classic wooden doors to modern glass and steel designs. At DoorElegance, we believe that a door is not just a functional element of your home, but also a statement of style and elegance. Our team of expert designers and craftsmen work tirelessly to bring you doors that combine durability, security, and beauty. We use only the highest quality materials and the latest manufacturing techniques to ensure that every door we produce meets our exacting standards. We are committed to providing exceptional customer service, from the initial consultation to the final installation. Our professional team is here to guide you through every step of the process, helping you choose the right door for your needs and ensuring a seamless installation experience. Join the thousands of satisfied customers who have made DoorElegance their trusted choice for high-quality doors. Discover the elegance and craftsmanship that sets us apart, and let us help you transform your home with the perfect door. Looking For Answers? Check Below! What types of doors do you offer? We offer a wide range of doors including wooden doors, glass doors, steel doors, and custom-designed doors to suit various styles and needs. Can I customize my door? Yes, we provide customizable design options. You can choose the material, style, finish, and other details to create a door that perfectly matches your home. Do you provide installation services? Yes, our professional team offers installation services to ensure your doors are fitted perfectly and securely. What materials do you use? We use high-quality materials including solid wood, tempered glass, and steel to ensure our doors are durable and long-lasting. How do I maintain my door? Maintenance depends on the material of your door. For wooden doors, regular polishing is recommended. Glass doors can be cleaned with glass cleaner, and steel doors can be wiped with a damp cloth. Do you offer warranties? Yes, all our doors come with a warranty to cover any manufacturing defects. The duration of the warranty varies by product. pages.privacy: DoorElegance: Your Premier Door Store in India | Privacy Policy Home Catalog Why Choose us Features Work Process Privacy Policy At DoorElegance, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or interact with us online. Information Collection We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and address when you place an order, request information, or sign up for our newsletter. We also collect non-personal information such as browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. Use of Information The information we collect is used to process transactions, improve customer service, personalize user experience, and send periodic emails regarding your order or other products and services. Protection of Information We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information. Cookies We use cookies to enhance your experience on our site. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your web browser (if you allow) that enable the site's or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. Disclosure of Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. Third-Party Links Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third-party products or services on our website. These third-party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We, therefore, have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Consent By using our site, you consent to our website's privacy policy. Changes to our Privacy Policy If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page. Policy changes will apply only to information collected after the date of the change. If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, you may contact us using the information below: Email: doorelegance@gmail.com Links Home Catalog Why Choose us Features Work Process Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions Contacts 240, Velachery Main Rd, Durga Colony, East Tambaram, Sembakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600073, India +919445888601 doorelegance@gmail.com
